# Tiago Danin - Mobile Developer & Bug Hunter

## About
Mobile Developer with expertise in Java, Kotlin, Obj-C, Swift, React Native, and Flutter, also experienced in front-end, back-end, and desktop development for macOS & Linux. Passionate about open source, automation, and solving real-world problems, always looking for new challenges. Currently diving into Digital Marketing to expand my knowledge beyond coding.

Outside of work, I'm a runner, dancer, and music lover—always seeking new ways to grow, challenge myself, and enjoy life.

## Technical Skills

### Mobile Development
- Flutter, React Native, Xamarin
- Java, Kotlin, Obj-C, Swift, SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Ionic

### DevOps & Cloud
- Firebase, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub CI/CD, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker

### Frontend & Backend
- HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue.js, Tailwind
- Node.js, Express, Elixir, PostgreSQL, SQLite

### Design & Game Development
- Figma, Mobile UX, Adobe XD, Canva
- Unity, Flame, LÖVE, Pixel Art, Blender

## Professional Experience

**Idopter Labs** (2022 - Present)
Mobile Developer - Development of hybrid solutions with React Native and Flutter, system architectures, project documentation, and test creation.

**VoxData Technology** (2019 - 2022)
Mobile Developer - Development of native and hybrid mobile solutions, system architectures, project documentation, and test creation.

**HackerOne** (2018 - Present)
Independent Security Researcher - Vulnerability assessments, security flaw reporting, Android app reverse engineering.

**IssueHunt** (2018 - 2019)
Backend Developer - Node.js applications development and open source contributions.

## Featured Projects

**BICOS** - Open Banking application that won TecBan hackathon competition
**CAM Covers** - Photo to album cover transformation app
**React Native - Zendesk SDK** - Customer support integration wrapper
**The Slime Dungeon** - Flutter game with Bonfire engine
**Virtual Pocket Air Conditioning** - Relaxing sound app for better sleep
